text: Hagi Usia'a ka'ma kokampima manine'za kuma'ma kegavama hu nontmina negino, tinkeriramina kafintetere hu'ne. Na'ankure agra Sefela kokampine, agupofinena tusi'a bulimakao afu kevu ante'negu anara hu'ne. Ana nehuno tusi eri'za vahetami zamavarege'za hozafine, waini hozafinena eri'zana eri'naze. Na'ankure agra hozama ante'zanku avesi avesi nehia ne' mani'ne.
